name: PointPay Crypto Banking Token V2  (PXP)
description:
We have already paid for the logo change. Please, refer to the #22331.

Please, find the required information below:

• What is the purpose of this token? How will it benefit Trust Wallet users?

PointPay customers who own PXP tokens receive a number of perks
and incentives:
• Dynamically reduce Maker/Taker fees based on how many tokens
you hold in your account;
• Earn up to 10% per annum by holding PXP tokens in your PointPay
Bank Savings account;
• Earn up to 20% return on your PXP investments, depending on the
number of tokens you stake;
• Lower the interest rate on instant crypto loans;
• Send instant payments to other customers for free within
the PointPay ecosystem;
• Watch premium video tutorials on cryptocurrencies and trading
in our Crypto School (if you hold at least 2,000 PXP tokens
in the PointPay ecosystem);
• Get exclusive access to the promising projects in the crypto space
on our Launchboard platform.

• How is the token being distributed? Are you conducting an airdrop?

All tokens were distributed during the ICO. We are not conducting an airdrop.

• Did you sell the tokens at an Initial Coin Offering (ICO) or a token presale?

Tokens were sold during the ICO and presale. ICO dates: from 25th Jun 2020 to June 30th, 2021

• Is the token listed on a centralized/decentralized exchange?

PXP is listed on the following markets: Bittrex Global, BitGlobal, Bitrue, Whitebit, CoinTige, and Uniswap (V3).

• Is a Smart Contract audit completed? Where can we find this information?

The audit can be found here:
https://www.certik.com/projects/pointpay
